name: Apple_Scab
precautions: Regularly prune and dispose of infected leaves.
Apply fungicides during the growing season.
cure: Apply appropriate fungicides as recommended.

name: Apple_BlackRot
precautions: Use fungicides to prevent and control the disease.
Remove and destroy infected plant material.
cure: Apply fungicides and maintain good orchard hygiene.

name: Apple_CedarAppleRust
precautions: Plant resistant apple varieties.
Apply fungicides during wet seasons.
cure: Use fungicides and remove cedar trees in the vicinity.

name: Apple_Healthy
cure: No specific precautions or cure required for a healthy apple plant.

name: Cherry_powdered_milddew
precautions: Apply fungicides during the growing season.

cure: Use fungicides and improve air circulation.
